author: Rachel Bachman
title: Chloe Kim Beats, Eats and Tweets (Not In That Order) - WSJ
text:
After Chloe Kim obliterated the competition in the Olympic snowboard womenâ€™s halfpipe, the Korean-American phenom strolled past reporters scooping from a tiny container. Her reward: chocolate mousse.
Kim has become known as much for her appetite as her otherworldly talent, thanks to a social-media savvy that is common among other 17-year-olds but uncommon among Olympic athletes.
